title.rendered: Danish Air Transport Airline in Vamdrup, Denmark

content.rendered:
DAT was founded as Danish Air Transport and started operations in 1989, initially as a cargo airline. DAT, formerly known as Danish Air Transport, started as a freight carrier operating with a single twin engine plane that flew with everything from mail and packages to racehorses.

 

Danish Air Transport Airline in Vamdrup, Denmark Contact Address, Phone, Email and Website

Danish Air Transport Airline Address: Vamdrup, Denmark

Danish Air Transport Airline Phone: +45 76 92 30 40

Email: kundeservice@dat.dk

Norway
Tel: +47 53 40 37 07
Email: billett@stordlufthamn.no

Italy
Tel: +39 02 89 60 88 20
Email: servizioclienti@flydat.it

Germany / French
Tel: +49 6893 83 300
Email: dat@scn-airport.de

Danish Air Transport Airline Official website: https://dat.dk/

Danish Air Transport Airline Online Check-in: www.dat.dk/check-in/

Note: Online check-in is available 22 hours prior to scheduled time of departure.
Billund Airport: Online check-in is available 12 hours prior to scheduled time of departure.
Aarhus Airport: No Online check-in for departure.

Danish Air Transport Airline Baggage Allowance

View Danish Air Transport Airline Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Danish Air Transport Airline

Total fleet: 19

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A321-200
  • ATR 42-300
  • ATR 42-500
  • ATR 72-200
  • ATR 72-500
  • ATR 72-600
  • McDonnell Douglas MD-83
  • McDonnell Douglas MD-82

Queries handled by Danish Air Transport Airline Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Danish Air Transport Airline in Vamdrup, Denmark Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Danish Air Transport Airline in Vamdrup, Denmark: (click on the stars below)
